user.title: Add Philips SICP Display
user.description: Provide the connection details for the display. NOTE: The display must be turned on and connected to a network accessible by Home Assistant.

data_description.mac: Ensure the display shares the same subnet with Home Assistant. If not the case, allow access between those subnets and configure a static ARP entry on your router with a command similar to `arp -i brXX -s 192.168.XX.YYY 18:65:71:ZZ:ZZ:ZZ` before proceeding, so that broadcast messages reach the display. This will let the WoL packets wake up the display when it's turned off.

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the display. Confirm the IP, monitor ID, and network reachability.
error.setup_error: Error during display setup or connection check: {error_detail}
error.invalid_monitor_id: Monitor ID must be a number between 1 and 255.
